title: GaN Shines Brightly, But It’s Not the Only Star in the Sky
summary: Like Gallium Arsenide (GaAs) and laterally diffused metal-oxide-semiconductor (LDMOS) before it, Gallium Nitride (GaN) is a revolutionary technology playing an outsize role in enabling the RF, microwave, and millimeter-wave systems of the future. Yet it’s not a panacea and other technologies still have important roles to play.
